product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Foam Mat 625 Sleeping Pad - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: Add a regular-size ALPS Mountaineering Foam Mat 625 Sleeping Pad under your sleeping bag to improve the level of comfort when you're backpacking. Foam mat is lightweight so you won't be hauling along too much extra weight on your next hike, but will be adding enough padding for a good night's sleep. Textured foam insulates to help keep you warm and also keeps the mat from sliding around. ALPS Mountaineering Foam Mat 625 Sleeping Pad comes with straps so when you're finished, you can roll it up and easily transport and store it. Special buy.
short_description: Add a regular-size ALPS Mountaineering Foam Mat 625 Sleeping Pad under your sleeping bag to improve the level of comfort when you're backpacking.
